title: Another World Transfer in Game Character - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Adventurers   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Game Elements   Hidden Abilities   Level System   Loli   Magic   Male to Female   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Race Change   Transported to Another World
author: Kaburagi Haruka   鏑木ハルカ
description:
The protagonist who's been playing a retro MMORPG in the golden age of VRMMOs was suddenly thrown off to another world. Moreover, he appeared in the dead center of large plains, with nothing but a labyrinth in front. He started creating things in order to survive there along with a girl it kept within.

Before long, the protagonist meets with the transmigrators from different games. He gets along with some and fights with others as he spends his time leisurely.>
